summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Security Intelligence Platform. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend working after fixing null reference errors. All core features tested including repository management, scanning, vulnerability detection, OWASP mapping, and AI integration.

ui_bugs.issue: Fixed null reference errors when accessing stats.severity_distribution properties

passed_tests: API Health Check - All endpoints responding correctly
Repository Management - Create, list, get, delete operations working
Security Scanning - Scan initiation and status tracking functional
Vulnerability Detection - OWASP Top 10 mapping and categorization working
AI Fix Recommendations - Multi-LLM support (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini) configured
Statistics and Reporting - Security scores and report generation working
Frontend Navigation - All routes and components loading correctly
Form Functionality - Repository creation form working properly
Scan Results Display - Vulnerability listing and filtering functional
Header Navigation - Logo and menu navigation working
